scripts.changelog: auto-changelog -p --template keepachangelog auto-changelog --breaking-pattern 'BREAKING CHANGE:' && git add CHANGELOG.md dist
scripts.bundle: npm run suffix | xargs -I {} dir-archiver --src . --dest ./dist/$npm_package_name-{}.zip --exclude .DS_Store .git .gitattributes .github .gitignore README.md composer.json composer.lock node_modules vendor package-lock.json package.json .github
